RelatedSentence: KUALA LUMPUR : National Unity Consultative Council ( NUCC ) plans to present to the prime minister by this July , a Preliminary Report based on the findings of the Unity Dialogue and a status report of the progress made towards the formulation of the National Unity Blue Print .
